pulls.title: Propose slightly different structure for initial draft
pulls.author: saradickinson

reviews.author: ShivanKaul
reviews.body: This makes sense to me - I think we should also change the draft name to be *less* general i.e. draft-ip-address-privacy-considerations

reviews.author: ShivanKaul
reviews.body: I made a couple of minor changes

pulls.title: Edits
pulls.author: sysrqb
pulls.body: Some small edits and started filling in some of the empty sections. I'm happy to get feedback/suggestions on improvements.

pulls.title: Edits2
pulls.author: sysrqb
pulls.body: 5748b25 was tagged as `draft-ip-address-privacy-considerations-00`. 2576050 fills in some more sections and attempts making the existing text more understandable.

pulls.title: Luigi's contribution
pulls.author: ggx
pulls.body:
Hereafter a list of the main changes. IMHO with these changes the draft is in good shape to ask PEARG community if the document is going in the right direction. Hopefully it is and we can later add more text to the different sections. 

- Added several references
- Added subsection 3.3 on law issues
- Bootstrapped section 3.1
- Added text section 3.2
- Proposed content for 3.4
- Added text and revised section 4.1

comments.author: saradickinson
comments.body: @ggx Thanks for this PR! It seems Matthew did a PR just before you so we've merged his and there are now a few conflicts. Would you be able to take a look and fix those up?

comments.author: ggx
comments.body:
Hi,

I’ll have a look during the weekend

Ciao

L.

> 
> >  
> -Commerical VPNs offer a layer of indirection between the user and the destination, however if the VPN endpoint's IP address is static then this simply substitutes one address for another. In addition, commerial VPNs replace tracking across sites with a single company that may track their users' activities.
> +## Mitigations for IP address tracking
> Most conflicts with Matthew's update are in this section

I think we should leave the doc name as `draft-ip-address-privacy-considerations` unless you had a specific reason for changing it?
Most conflicts with Matthew's update are in this section
I think the  "-latest" suffix is necessary for MT's tooling to produce the correct document version when compiling.

Hi,

I went over the conflicts and solved them adjusting the text as needed.

Ciao

L.
